title: New: City Beautiful – Apogee
body:
This stunning, atmospheric debut single from Sydney’s **City Beautiful** comes out of nowhere, drawing from the likes of Bonobo, Tycho and Teen Daze, it’s effortlessly cool and undeniably brilliant.

With another two singles expected over the coming months, it’ll be worthwhile keeping an eye on this guy to see where he takes his sound from here. Check out _Apogee_ below. ([via](http://acidstag.com/2014/09/04/city-beautiful-apogee-premiere/))

With another two singles expected over the coming months, it’ll be worthwhile keeping an eye on this guy to see where he takes his sound from \[…\]
